monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Player can ride the Monster - Increases jump height
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: When this Monster uses an action, it only loses a third of its Charge stacks (rounded down).

skills.name: Aerial Strike
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) physical damage (wind) applies Sidekick (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Aerial Strike Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 115% (460%) physical damage (wind) applies Sidekick & Might (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Burn Down
skills.description: Unique Aura: Burn (Debuff) damage dealt to enemies is increased by 50%.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Edge
skills.description: Each Critical Hit grants this Monster a Charge stack.

skills.name: Critical Healing
skills.description: Healing actions can land a "Critical Heal" to heal for an increased amount, based on Critical Chance and Critical Damage. (Triggering any Crit-based skills)

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Cyclone
skills.description: 2 x 75% (150%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Cyclone Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Earth Weakness
skills.description: Earth damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Energy Conversion
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party consumes a Charge stack, it is healed by 1% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Feather Storm
skills.description: 6 x 25% (150%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Feather Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 35% (210%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Feather Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 45% (270%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Feather Storm Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 50% (350%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Feather Storm Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (wind)

skills.name: Fire Pillar
skills.description: 3 x 200% (600%) magical damage (fire) applies Sorcery, Regeneration & Spellshield (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Full Aerial Assault
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Gift of Life
skills.description: Revives all allies Heal all for 3 x (400 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Charging
skills.description: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Igniting Stings
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Improved Mana Regeneration
skills.description: +20% Mana Regeneration

skills.name: Kindle
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Burn
skills.description: Whenever an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, regenerate 10 Mana.

skills.name: Mana Charging
skills.description: For every 40 Mana regenerated, gain a Charge stack.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mass Mana Charging
skills.description: Aura: For every 60 Mana regenerated by this Monster, apply a Charge stack to the whole party.

skills.name: Multi Burn
skills.description: Aura: Burn (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Regeneration
skills.description: Aura: Regeneration (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Phoenix Affinity
skills.description: When this Monster is knocked out for the first time in combat, it is revived with 10% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Phoenix Heritage
skills.description: Aura: Each Aerial and Bird Monster in your party applies Burn on a random enemy after each action.

skills.name: Purify
skills.description: Healing actions also remove 4 harmful Stacks (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether). Multi-Target-Heals remove 2.

skills.name: Reborn from Ashes
skills.description: When this monster is revived or revives another monster, it additionally heals 30% of its Max Health and gains 7 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Restoration
skills.description: Unique Aura: Regeneration (Buff) also has a 50% chance to remove a Debuff at the start of the turn.

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Shred
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Shred Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +60%

skills.name: Shred Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 135% (270%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +70%

skills.name: Slow Burn
skills.description: When this Monster uses an action, it only loses a third of its Charge stacks (rounded down).

skills.name: Spark Shower
skills.description: 6 x 20% (120%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 30% (180%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 45% (315%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Support
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Support Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Support Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Regeneration & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Transfusion
skills.description: Recover Health equal to 200% the amount of Mana regenerated.

drops.name: Phoenix Serum
drops.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x 450

drops.name: Skill Potion
drops.description: Grants a skill point. Can only be consumed once per Monster

drops.name: Spark
drops.description: Defense +8 Mana Regeneration +8 When getting attacked, 35% chance to apply Burn (Debuff) on the attacker
